name: INTransferMoneyIntent
desc: A request to transfer money between two accounts.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: init(from: INPaymentAccount?, to: INPaymentAccount?, transactionAmount: INPaymentAmount?, transactionScheduledDate: INDateComponentsRange?, transactionNote: String?)
items.desc: Initializes the intent object with the specified transaction details.

items.name: var fromAccount: INPaymentAccount?
items.desc: The account containing the funds to transfer.

items.name: var transactionScheduledDate: INDateComponentsRange?
items.desc: The date on which to transfer the funds.

items.name: var transactionNote: String?
items.desc: An optional note associated with the transaction.
